snippet: Connecticut reached a four-year, $4.55 million agreement with the regional cable network SNY to televise its women’s basketball games.
abstract: Connecticut reaches four-year, $4.55 million agreement with regional cable network SNY to televise its women's basketball games; other basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Connecticut reached a four-year, $4.55 million agreement with the regional cable network SNY to televise its women’s basketball games.

headline.seo: SNY Will Televise University of Connecticut Women’s Games
